QuestData.Title: The Dark that Blinds Us
QuestData.Description: After years of research, there is still so much I do not understand about the Shadowmoon.$B$BTo the southwest are stone monuments detailing the orcs' history.$B$BI'm not able to get close enough to examine the stones, but perhaps you can.$B$BIf you could take a chalk rubbing of the words written on those stones, and I will reward you handsomely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take chalk rubbings of the northern, eastern, western, and southern Tribal Stones in the Whispering Fields.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh my, I see, I see! These writings will give me much insight into the Shadowmoon clan's culture.$B$BThank you, $n.
